```{r data generation, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
format <- sample(1:3, 1)

if(format == 1) {
    # Piecewise where k is used twice; a total of 3 possibilities
    # X values 
    x_vals <- sort(sample(-50:50, 3))
    constants <- sample(1:20, 3)

    a <- constants[1]
    c <- constants[3]
    p2 <- round(constants[2]/sum(constants), 2)

    pmf <- paste0("$$p_X(x) = \\begin{cases}", a,"k & x = ", x_vals[1], "\\\\ ", p2, " & x =", x_vals[2], " \\\\ ", c, "k & x = ", x_vals[3], ".\\end{cases}")

}

alpha <- round(runif(1, 0.01, 0.2), 2)
crit  <- qt(1-alpha, df = n-1)

if(sample(c(0,1),1) == 0) {
    # Reject
    val <- runif(1,  1.1 * crit, 2 * crit)
} else {
    # Fail to Reject
    val <- runif(1, -1.5 * crit, 0.9 * crit)
}

mean <- round(val * sd/sqrt(n) + amt, 1)

ans1 <- (mean - amt)/(sd / sqrt(n))
ans2 <- 1 - pt(ans1, df = n-1)
ans3 <- c(ans2 <= alpha, ans2 > alpha)

id <- sprintf("%010d", sample(0:1000000000, 1))

```
